wikipedia_page.main: William Yates (5 August 1880 – 27 December 1967) was a British racewalker. He competed in the 10 km walk at the 1912 Summer Olympics.

response: * William Yates (1880–1967), racewalker, competed at the 1912 Summer Olympics
